DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess whether estrogen pre-treatment can allow retrieval of 2 additional oocytes in GnRH antagonist protocol.
DOC.brief_title: Estrogen Pretreatment Prior to GnRH Antagonist Protocol
DOC.criteria: regular normoovulatory cycles (28 to 35 days) age < 38 years, body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 30 first or second IVF/ICSI attempt high basal levels of serum FSH or E2, less than 5 follicles at the antral follicular count performed on day 3 of a spontaneous cycle, history of high (>20 oocytes) or low (< 5 oocytes) ovarian response in a previous IVF attempt
